power1:
When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die

When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die 
            and add the Magic trait

When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die 
            and add the Magic trait and the Fire trait
power2:
You may play any number of blessings on your combat check; 
            recharge them instead of discarding them.
drunken_master_power1:
When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die

When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die 
            and add the Magic trait

When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die 
            and add the Magic trait and the Fire trait
drunken_master_power2:
You may play any number of blessings on your combat check; 
            recharge them instead of discarding them.
drunken_master_power3:
When dealt damage other than Combat damage, reduce that damage
            by 1.

When dealt damage other than Combat damage, reduce that damage
            by 2.

When dealt damage other than Combat damage, reduce that damage
            by 3.
drunken_master_power4:
When you play a boon with the Liquid trait, succed at a Fortitude 6 check to recharge it
            instead of banishing it.
drunken_master_power5: Add 6 to your check to acquire a boon with the Liquid trait.
drunken_master_power6: At the start of your turn, you must draw 1 card.
zen_archer_power1:
When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die

When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die 
            and add the Magic trait

When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, 
            you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die 
            and add the Magic trait and the Fire trait
zen_archer_power2:
You may play any number of blessings on your combat check; 
            recharge them instead of discarding them.
zen_archer_power3:
When dealt damage other than Combat damage, reduce that damage
            by 1.

When dealt damage other than Combat damage, reduce that damage
            by 2.
zen_archer_power4: When you play a weapon with the Ranged trait, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.
zen_archer_power5: Add 2 to your check to acquire a boon with the Ranged trait.
Add 4 to your check to acquire a boon with the Ranged trait.
zen_archer_power6: At the start of your turn with no cards in hand, you may draw 1 card.
